jobDescription: Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) at Heritage Community will direct, administer and document care given to residents.Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) will also assist in the supervision of CNA’s.These positions work twelve (12) hour shifts and the shift is from 6:30pm - 7:00am*Licensed to practice nursing in the State of Michigan*Long term care experience is highly desirable*Dependable, customer service oriented, and excellent communication skills*Must have knowledge of Michigan Nurse Practice Act
